column1:
16 months after @badiucao’s Hong Kong show was cancelled, the dissident Chinese cartoonist is set to revive the exhibition in Australia, offering a scathing critique of China as it grapples with 2 themes of his work: coronavirus & HK protests. My latest:

https://www.washingtonpost.com/world/asia_pacific/dissident-artist-known-as-chinas-banksy-takes-aim-at-beijing--from-australia/2020/02/18/b5df07fa-5144-11ea-80ce-37a8d4266c09_story.html …
